name: keychain.tools
tagline: Blockchain-based decentralised SSL/TLS session verification & proudly #CAfree
body:
Hello there, big crazy world :-)

This is merely a placeholder for our announcement post... which is due any time now.

![keychain.tools logo ~ green](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/167daed71fc656e84157f748f76b8c3d7cbbd40e/68747470733a2f2f692e696d6775722e636f6d2f6933426f3132762e706e67)

A long-winded essay describing the history & theory behind KeyChain, & how it fits into the larger secure networking ecosystem can be found here: [cryptostorm.org/onionhttps](https://cryptostorm.org/viewtopic.php?f=47&t=8633)

Cheers, 

_~ cryptostorm_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
